quotes.message: There is no future in any job. The future lies in the person who holds the job.
quotes.name: George Crane

quotes.message: Find a job you enjoy doing, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: People may take a job for more money, but they often leave it for more recognition.
quotes.name: Bob Nelson

quotes.message: It is easier to do a job right than to explain why you didn't.
quotes.name: Martin Van Buren

quotes.message: Do the hard jobs first. The easy jobs will take care of themselves.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Do your job and demand your compensation but in that order.
quotes.name: Cary Grant

quotes.message: If you have a job without any aggravations, you don't have a job.
quotes.name: Malcolm S. Forbes

quotes.message: You'll be happy if you are doing a job you love.
quotes.name: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.message: If you say your job is something you 'don't plan on doing forever,' then why are you doing it now?
quotes.name: Simon Sinek

quotes.message: A lot of people quit looking for work as soon as they find a job.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: While you wait for your dream job, you can engage yourself with the available job.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Do the job for the joy of work.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: A job should only be a means of attaining the highest goal.
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: He who loves his job, will own it.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Every job is good if you do your best and work hard. A man who works hard stinks only to the ones that have nothing to do but smell.
quotes.name: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.message: A job is a safe place to hide from work.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: There are no menial jobs, only menial attitudes.
quotes.name: William J. Bennett,

quotes.message: The best job goes to the person who can get it done without passing the buck or coming back with excuses.
quotes.name: G M Trevelyan

quotes.message: The best way to appreciate your job is to imagine yourself without one.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: You will find a job, if you are willing to work.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: A job isn't just a job. It's who you are.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Big jobs usually go to the men who prove their ability to outgrow small ones.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: The big jobs are for the ones who can handle the small ones.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: If a job is worth doing, it's worth doing well.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Many men beg for a job but have no clue what hard work really means.
quotes.name: Bill Courtney

quotes.message: The only job where you start at the top, is digging a hole.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Joy in your Job is possible to the extent you're willing to choose it.
quotes.name: Todd Stocker

quotes.message: The difference between a job and a career is the difference between forty and sixty hours a week.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: The problem with having a job is that it gets in the way of getting rich.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: When you are asked if you can do a job, tell 'em, 'Certainly I can!' Then get busy and find out how to do it.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: When you have a permanent job, remember that the job is permanent not you.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: If you think you're too big for small jobs, maybe you're too small for big job.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: If you do the right job then money will come to you. Because people who need you will request, will ask for you, will attract you, and will be willing to pay you for your services.
quotes.name: Jose Silva

quotes.message: Find a job you like and you add five days to every week.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.message: Every job is a self-portrait of the person who does it. Autograph your work with excellence.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Work harder on yourself than you do on your job.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: The most important question to ask yourself on the job is not, what am I getting? but what am I becoming?
quotes.name: Harold W. Dodds

quotes.message: Don't be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs. Every time you conquer one it makes you that much stronger. If you do the little jobs well, the big ones will tend to take care of themselves.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Work hard at your job and you can make a living. Work hard on yourself and you can make a fortune.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: I choose a lazy person to do a hard job. Because a lazy person will find an easy way to do it.
quotes.name: Bill Gates

quotes.message: The biggest mistake that you can make is to believe that you are working for somebody else. Job security is gone. The driving force of a career must come from the individual.
quotes.name: Earl Nightingale

quotes.message: Nothing is particularly hard if you divide it into small jobs.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: The hardest job kids face today is learning good manners without seeing any.
quotes.name: Fred Astaire

quotes.message: For many people a job is more than an income. It's an important part of who we are.
quotes.name: Paul Clitheroe

quotes.message: Transferring your passion to your job is far easier than finding a job that happens to match your passion.
quotes.name: Seth Godin

quotes.message: If you have a job without aggravations, you don't have a job.
quotes.name: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.message: Life is supposed to be fun. It's not a job or occupation. We're here only once and we should have a bit of a laugh.
quotes.name: Billy Connolly

quotes.message: Never continue in a job you don't enjoy. If you're happy in what you're doing, you'll like yourself, you'll have inner peace. And if you have that, along with physical health, you will have had more success than you could possibly have imagined.
quotes.name: Johnny Carson

quotes.message: Why compare yourself with others? No one in the entire world can do a better job of being you than you.
quotes.name: Eric Thomas

quotes.message: A recession is when your neighbor loses his job. A depression is when you lose yours.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: See the job, do the job, stay out of the misery.
quotes.name: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.message: My job is not to be easy on people. My job is to take these great people we have and to push them and make them even better.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: It's just a job. Grass grows, birds fly, waves pound the sand. I beat people up.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali

quotes.message: I'm working full time on my job and part time on my fortune.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Always take a job that is too big for you.
quotes.name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.message: True courage is being afraid, and going ahead and doing your job anyhow, that's what courage is.
quotes.name: Norman Schwarzkopf

quotes.message: It is not enough to be a hardworking person. Equally important is the job you are working at.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: They call upon us to supply American boys to do the job that Asian boys should do.
quotes.name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.message: Let's take care of the necessities first, give people jobs, and find a way to get us out of poverty.
quotes.name: Eartha KittEartha Kitt

quotes.message: Ayn Rand more than anyone else did a fantastic job of explaining the morality of capitalism, the morality of individualism.
quotes.name: Paul Ryan

quotes.message: Peacekeeping is not a job for soldiers, but only soldiers can do it.
quotes.name: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.message: It's not what you achieve, it's what you overcome. That's what defines your career.
quotes.name: Carlton Fisk

quotes.message: Only undertake what you can do in an excellent fashion. There are no prizes for average performance.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Starting a new job is always scary, or at least for me it's always scary. It's like the first day of school.
quotes.name: Sean Maher

quotes.message: Criticism of others is futile and if you indulge in it often you should be warned that it can be fatal to your career.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Good government only happens when the people working in it do their jobs, and do them well.
quotes.name: Matthew Lesko

quotes.message: It's not your job to get people to like you, it's your job to like people.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.message: People should wake up in the morning and say 'I am not a job seeker, I am a job-creator.
quotes.name: Muhammad Yunus
